segment.target: OperatingSystem - Computer Report

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.target: Windows 7

segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: The OperatingSystem - Computer Report screen shows the following information for each computer in your organization:
segment.target: The OperatingSystem - Computer Report screen shows the following information for each computer in your organization:

segment.source: The computer name, domain, and operating system.
segment.target: The computer name, domain, and operating system.

segment.source: The count of applications and devices installed on the computer.
segment.target: The count of applications and devices installed on the computer.

segment.source: The count of installed applications and devices that have issues.
segment.target: The count of installed applications and devices that have issues.

segment.source: To open the OperatingSystem - Computer Report screen
segment.target: To open the OperatingSystem - Computer Report screen

segment.source: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), on the Quick Reports pane, click Analyze.
segment.target: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), on the Quick Reports pane, click Analyze.

segment.source: In the Quick Reports pane, under an operating system heading, click Computers.
segment.target: In the Quick Reports pane, under an operating system heading, click Computers.

segment.source: Using the OperatingSystem - Computer Report Screen
segment.target: Using the OperatingSystem - Computer Report Screen

segment.source: On the OperatingSystem - Computer Report screen, you can perform the following actions:
segment.target: On the OperatingSystem - Computer Report screen, you can perform the following actions:

segment.source: Export the report data to a spreadsheet, or import a report.
segment.target: Export the report data to a spreadsheet, or import a report.

segment.source: For more information, see Saving, Opening, and Exporting Reports.
segment.target: For more information, see Saving, Opening, and Exporting Reports.

segment.source: Synchronize your compatibility issues by using the Microsoft Compatibility Exchange.
segment.target: Synchronize your compatibility issues by using the Microsoft Compatibility Exchange.

segment.source: For more information, see Sending and Receiving Compatibility Data.
segment.target: For more information, see Sending and Receiving Compatibility Data.

segment.source: Filter the report by using the query builder.
segment.target: Filter the report by using the query builder.

segment.source: For more information, see Filtering Your Compatibility Data.
segment.target: For more information, see Filtering Your Compatibility Data.

segment.source: Assign categories and subcategories to a computer.
segment.target: Assign categories and subcategories to a computer.

segment.source: For more information, see Categorizing Your Compatibility Data.
segment.target: For more information, see Categorizing Your Compatibility Data.

segment.source: Specify the importance of a computer to your organization.
segment.target: Specify the importance of a computer to your organization.

segment.source: For more information, see Prioritizing Your Compatibility Data.
segment.target: For more information, see Prioritizing Your Compatibility Data.

segment.source: Double-click a computer name to view its associated dialog box.
segment.target: Double-click a computer name to view its associated dialog box.

segment.source: For more information, see Computer Dialog Box.
segment.target: For more information, see Computer Dialog Box.
